description.message: Franklin Sidekick allows authors in Franklin projects to easily preview and publish their content.

config_project_empty.message: You haven't added any projects yet.

config_project_exists.message: A configuration for this project already exists.

config_shareurl_description.message: Ask someone with a Sidekick to share its URL with you by clicking the sharing icon on the right hand side.

config_shareurl_copied.message: Sharing URL for $1 copied to clipboard

config_add_no_mountpoint.message:
Project added to Sidekick, but ...

Retrieving the content URL has failed, so you won't be able to use Sidekick in edit mode yet. To add it manually, click the Edit button next to the project's configuration.

config_delete_confirm.message: Do you really want to delete this project?

config_invalid_import.message: Choose a valid file to import

config_invalid_export.message: You don't have any configuration to export yet

config_import_description.message: Import a configuration from your computer. Make sure you have a backup of your current configuration!

config_import_confirm.message: Do you really want to import this configuration and overwrite the current one?

config_export_description.message: Back up your configuration to your computer.

config_delete_all_description.message: Caution: This action cannot be undone!

config_delete_all_confirm.message: Do you really want to delete all settings?

config_unsupported_legacy.message: This site is no longer supported

developer_mode_description.message: Invoke a local development version of the Sidekick

branch_name.message: Test a branch version of the Sidekick

admin_version.message: Use a specific Franklin Admin API version

push_down_content.message: Push down content instead of overlaying

push_down_content_description.message: Note: Depending on the site's structure, this may require custom project configuration to work as expected.

help_opt_out_alert.message: Help turned off. You can turn it back on on under Options > User experience.

help_user_status_description.message: Checked topics will not be shown anymore. Remove the checkmark next to a topic you wish to see again.
